sentences.en: A commonly used microcomputer algorithm for multiplication.
sentences.cn: 微型计算机一种常用的乘法算法.

sentences.en: A microcomputer small enough to use on one's lap.
sentences.cn: 一种通常用手推动的小型带轮车辆.

sentences.en: A newly - devised microcomputer can act as a guide to a blind person.
sentences.cn: 一种新设计的微型计算机能够充任盲人的向导.

sentences.en: Applying advanced microcomputer control tone lighting and flame monitoring system.
sentences.cn: →采用先进的微电脑控制脉冲点火和火焰监测系统.

sentences.en: Controlled by microcomputer, displayed by big LCD, printing reports.
sentences.cn: 采用微电脑控制, 大屏幕液晶中文菜单显示, 打印输出中文报表.

sentences.en: Development of 51 single - chip microcomputer - based file system, fat 16 and achieve a fat 32.
sentences.cn: 基于51单片机开发的文件系统, 实现了fat16和fat32.

sentences.en: Even though it was a decisive commercial failure, it ignited the imagination of many people in the small but booming microcomputer industry.
sentences.cn: 尽管在商业上注定是一个失败，但它点燃了许多人对于微型计算机工业的憧憬和想像。

sentences.en: In a microcomputer, these are both on the microcomputer chip.
sentences.cn: 在微型计算机中, 这两个部分都在微型机芯片上.

sentences.en: Microcomputer control of the seat, the temperature be arbitrary regulation.
sentences.cn: 微电脑控制的座圈, 温度可任意调节.

sentences.en: Microcomputer is a very small computer, such as a laptop or personal computer.
sentences.cn: 微机计算机是一种非常小的计算机, 如膝上机或个人计算机.

sentences.en: Or, as in my case, turning on the old antique microcomputer to read my single-sided, single-density floppies might lead to a fire and the quick end of your weekend data retrieval project.
sentences.cn: 或者，像我所作的那样，打开一个旧的古董微型计算机来读取我的单面单密度磁盘，而这有可能引起一场火灾，以及你的周末数据检索计划的快速完结。

sentences.en: Physical units transmit information to and from the microcomputer via appropriate interface logic.
sentences.cn: 各种实体设备能够通过适当的接口逻辑电路对计算机传输(输入或输出)信息.

sentences.en: Serial Transfer Between IBM - PC Microcomputer and Single Board Computers.
sentences.cn: SIO串行接口电路的智能编程.

sentences.en: Status flags represent one of the simplest forms of microcomputer logic.
sentences.cn: 状态标志是微计算机逻辑中的一种最简单的形式之一.

sentences.en: The merchant sold electrical appliances, such as microcomputer, microphone, microprocessor and microwave ovens.
sentences.cn: 商人卖一些电器，比如微型计算机，话筒，微处理器和微波炉。

sentences.en: The single - chip microcomputer control technology is a lot more practical control technology.
sentences.cn: 而单片机技术是诸多微机控制中比较实用的控制技术.

sentences.en: The system usesthe single - chip microcomputer and the standard STD system.
sentences.cn: 实现了多数据的自动采集与控制及多功能.

sentences.en: To meet this goal, a microcomputer controlled hybrid powertrain was designed and built.
sentences.cn: 为了达到这一目标, 设计和制造了微计算机控制的混合式动力装置.

words.tran_cn: 微型集成电路片，微芯片
